General.Name: Avricore Health Inc
General.Description: Avricore Health Inc. engages in the health data and point-of-care technologies business in Canada. It provides HealthTab, a turnkey point-of-care testing platform that turns pharmacies into community point-of-care diagnostic centers. The company has strategic partnerships with Shoppers Drug Marts and Abbott. The company was formerly known as Vanc Pharmaceuticals Inc. and changed its name to Avricore Health Inc. in October 2018. Avricore Health Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
